channel.title: Sigsiu.NET News
channel.description: Latest News of Sigsiu.NET, the company behind SobiPro - best directory component for Joomla! powered websites!

item.title: Update of SP-GeoMap Module
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: An update of the SP-GeoMap Module is available. This is a maintenance release which includes two new languages.

item.title: New application Expiration
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: It is finally available: The Expiration application for SobiPro to let you manage the expiration notification and renew emails and the renew process.

item.title: SobiPro 1.1.13 available
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: This is a maintenance release. It is recommended to update SobiPro to version 1.1.13!

item.title: Export your data from Sobi2
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: We have released a version of our Sobi2 Export plugin for our club members to export data from a Sobi2 directory to import it into SobiPro.

item.title: Installation Services available
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: As requested by many of our users, we now offer an installation and configuration service for SobiPro and its applications.

item.title: SobiPro 1.1.12 stable released
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: SobiPro now supports dependencies lists, a long awaited feature, for free! As it is a maintenance release, it is recommended to update SobiPro to version 1.1.12!

item.title: New version of Import/Export Application finally available
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: The improved Import/Export Application is built for SobiPro 1.1 and features now category and CLI import and export.

item.title: Welcome in 2015 and welcome on our new website!
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: We are happy and excited to present you our new, improved website. We hope you will find that our new system will meet your needs.

item.title: Holiday Special
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: Again a year has passed and we offer again a Holiday Special. Get all SobiPro Subscription for 20% off.

item.title: SobiPro 1.1.11 stable released
item.author: Sigrid Suski
item.description: This is a maintenance release. It is recommended to update SobiPro to version 1.1.11!
